Package au.edu.anu.rscs.aot.queries.graph.node

Class TreeQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.anu.rscs.aot.queries.QueryAdaptor
      • au.edu.anu.rscs.aot.queries.graph.node.TreeQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Queryable
    public class TreeQuery
extends QueryAdaptor

    Get parts of a Tree starting from a TreeNode.

    Type of input to submit()
    TreeNode
    Type of result
    a TreeNode or a Collection<TreeNode>
    Fails if
    the tree must be searched up but no parent above the input node satisfies the query
    Author:
    Shayne Flint - 2/4/2012
    refactored by J. Gignoux - 12/4/2019 to handle new tree structure
    See Also:
    CoreQueries.parent(), CoreQueries.children(), CoreQueries.childTree(), CoreQueries.parent(Queryable), CoreQueries.childTree(Queryable)
